termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using the Zakatok platform

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using the Zakatok platform, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree to any part of these terms, please do not use our platform.

description.title: 2. Service Description
description.content: Zakatok is an electronic platform aimed at facilitating the process of donating Zakat and Sadaqah to approved charitable organizations. We provide services to connect donors with qualified organizations to receive donations.

userResponsibilities.title: 3. User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.content: Users must provide accurate and correct information, comply with local and international laws, and not use the platform for any illegal or harmful purposes.

prohibitedUses.title: 4. Prohibited Uses
prohibitedUses.content: It is prohibited to use the platform for any illegal activity, send harmful content, attempt to hack the system, or any activity that may harm the platform's reputation or other users.

intellectualProperty.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content, designs, and software on the Zakatok platform are protected by copyright. No part of the content may be copied, distributed, or modified without written permission.

limitationOfLiability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content: Zakatok is not responsible for any direct or indirect damages that may result from using the platform. We provide the service as is without warranties.

modifications.title: 7. Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Users will be notified of any material changes through the platform or email.

termination.title: 8. Service Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account at any time if you violate these terms or if there is any suspicious or harmful activity.

governingLaw.title: 9. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These terms are subject to the laws of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Any disputes will be resolved in the competent courts of the Kingdom.

contact.title: 10. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us via email: legal@zakatok.com

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: We are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data

informationCollection.title: 1. Information Collection
informationCollection.content: We collect information you provide to us directly when registering or using our services, including name, email, phone number, and payment information.

informationUsage.title: 2. Information Usage
informationUsage.content: We use your information to provide our services, process donations, communicate with you, improve user experience, and comply with applicable laws.

informationSharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
informationSharing.content: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with approved charitable organizations only for the purpose of completing donations.

dataSecurity.title: 4. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We use advanced encryption technologies to protect your data. All financial transactions are conducted through secure and encrypted channels.

cookies.title: 5. Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve user experience and remember your preferences. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.

userRights.title: 6. User Rights
userRights.content: You have the right to access, modify, or delete your data. You can request a copy of your data or unsubscribe at any time.

dataRetention.title: 7. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your data as long as your account is active or according to legal requirements. We will delete your data when the account is cancelled or the legal period expires.

childrenPrivacy.title: 8. Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our services are not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not collect personal information from children without parental consent.

internationalTransfers.title: 9. International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your data may be transferred to other countries for service processing. We ensure that all transfers are made according to appropriate protection standards.

policyUpdates.title: 10. Policy Updates
policyUpdates.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes via email or the platform.
